attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Inheritance Tax was set up to prevent wealth simply being handed down. This still makes sense, but with high house prices the current threshold catches house owners who are clearly not wealthy. Doubling the threshold would make this realistic. Scrapping it would be a bad move.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
